whatIs.title: What is Sexy Animation?
whatIs.description: Sexy Animation is a tool that enables creators to infuse their static images with enticing lifelike movements, using advanced AI technology. Perfect for adding a sultry twist to your anime, manga, and comic projects.

examples.title: Sexy Animation Examples
examples.description: Explore examples of mesmerizing animations created by our Sexy Animation Generator. See how your static images can transform into alluring videos!

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Upload the image you wish to animate. Whether it's a sensual anime character, a manga panel, or a comic illustration, our AI can infuse it with seductive motion.

steps.title: Enter a Prompt
steps.content: Provide a prompt to guide the animation. Describe the desired movements, expressions, or seductive actions you want the AI to create.

steps.title: Generate Animation
steps.content: Click the 'Generate Animation' button and let our AI cast its spell. Witness your image evolve into a captivating video.

steps.title: Download and Share
steps.content: Download your AI-generated animation and captivate your audience! Ideal for social media, personal projects, and more.

examples.title: Model: Wan
examples.description: Prompt: a woman with short dark hair, wearing a provocative black leather outfit with lace details, a deep neckline, and high-cut sides that accentuate her curves. She poses seductively in front of a grand mirror framed with ornate gold, with rich red curtains in the background. The camera slowly pans around her as she moves sensually, her hands tracing her body, the leather gleaming under soft spotlight. The scene builds with an erotic intensity as she adjusts her pose, emphasizing her figure, with subtle light reflections enhancing the provocative mood.
